lom:description.lom:string:
"The Sloan Career Cornerstone Center provides this page to support girls and women who are interested in exploring career paths in science, technology, engineering, mathematics, computing, and medicine.
According to a 2007 report by the Commission on Professionals in Science and Technology, women have made substantial progress in preparing for careers in science and engineering (S&E), earning half (50%) of the bachelor?s degrees, 44% of the master?s and 37% of the doctorates awarded in S&E fields in 2003-04." The site has university, mentoring, summer program, precollege and other resources.

lom:title.lom:string: Career Advising Resources for Women in Engineering, Math and Science
